Prohibited Uses6.1. Jurisdictions. Users located in or residents of Curacao, Aruba, Costa Rica, Bonaire, France, Saba, Netherlands, Statia, USA, and St Martin (the ‚ÄùProhibited Jurisdictions‚Äù) are not allowed to use the Service. A try at bypassing includes, but is not limited to, providing richy.casino with wrong or misleading data concerning your place of residence or location and manipulating the information used by richy.casino to verify your location.Source: https://richy.casino/uk/terms_of_serviceThen it does mean that using up VPN is a no go but if you are really that pushy then its up to your choice but dont get yourself caught.
